explanation: Looting/rummaging function as discard outlets for engines (madness, reanimator, etc.).
Impulse draw is not normal hand draw; runtime structural quotas should treat separately.
notes: Use separate weighting buckets at runtime.

explanation: Draw replacement implies replacement-effect subtype; ensure your replacement framework can consume this facet.
notes: If REPLACEMENT_EFFECT primitive exists, patch may add it.

explanation: Wheels often imply discard pressure; ensure opponent_discard facet is present when appropriate.
notes: Shuffle-wheels may not be discard; review.
